remarks: The sum of two group sums expressed as mappings.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 7-Apr-2019.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsummptfsadd as of 9-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsummptfsaddOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD.v $e |- ( ph -> ( H supp .0. ) e. Fin ) $.
gsummptfsaddOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
